text: Garba Duba (1942 â€“ 17 May 2024) is was a Nigerian Army Lieutenant General. He was the Governor of Bauchi State, Nigeria during the military regime of General Olusegun Obasanjo. Duba died on 17 May 2024 at the age of 82.General Garba Duba dies at 82 == References == Category:Nigerian politicians Category:Nigerian military people Category:1942 births Category:2024 deaths
title: Garba Duba
